name: The Faker
description:
Adds Emiya Shirou from Fate as a playable character.

Art assets originate from:
- Fate/Stay Night visual novel
- Fate/Unlimited Blade Works movie and anime series
- Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya: Oath Under Snow movie
- Today's Menu for the Emiya Family anime series
- Fate/Grand Order mobile game.
- @Nameless190247 (X/Twitter)
- 田子屋きよ (pixiv)
